headline.main: Cuomo Calls Anti-Semitic Attack in New York 'Reprehensible'
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Calls Anti-Semitic Attack in New York 'Reprehensible'

lead_paragraph: Visiting New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Sunday that a recent rash of anti-Semitic acts in the United States was "reprehensible" and his state would have no tolerance for them.
snippet: Visiting New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo said Sunday that a recent rash of anti-Semitic acts in the United States was "reprehensible" and his state would have no tolerance for them....
